entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
